WhyUs.aboutMe: The person behind this new Ruse site is me, Silvena – an optimist who believes that with enough will, we can make our city an even better place to live. I love Ruse, I love attending events, but I missed having a clear, organized place to see what's happening this week without scrolling through endless Facebook pages.
WhyUs.whyCreated: Ruse is rich in cultural events – concerts, theaters, workshops, children's events, sports, community meetups – but information about them is scattered across various Facebook pages and websites.
WhyUs.missedEvents: Very often I find out about a really interesting event after it has already happened, and probably there are others I never even knew took place.
WhyUs.goal: Our goal is to gather in one place the most interesting things happening in Ruse and the region and make them easy to discover.
WhyUs.whatMakesDifferent: Facebook is good, but it's not made for an organized calendar. Here you have:
WhyUs.searchAndFilters: Search by keyword, date, and topic (theater, workshops, kids, etc.)
WhyUs.cleanInterface: No ads, no unnecessary noise, focus only on Ruse and the region
WhyUs.howEventsAdded: Events are uploaded by organizers after registering on the site.
WhyUs.adminApproval: Every event is approved by an administrator before being published.
WhyUs.notAllowed: Illegal, misleading, gambling, or advertising events are not published.
WhyUs.report: If you see something that you think isn't okay, you can always write to me – I respond and correct it.
WhyUs.sendEvent: Even if you're not an organizer, you can share an important event.
WhyUs.reportMistake: Help us keep the information up-to-date and accurate.
WhyUs.newIdeas: Tags, filters, and features that would be useful to you.
WhyUs.everyEmailHelps: Every email with an idea or feedback helps make this site better.
WhyUs.contact: If you want to suggest a new idea, give feedback, or just say 'Hi, I like what you're doing,' you can write to me at:
WhyUs.contactFinal: I'd love to hear what you'd like to see more of in Ruse – both on the site and in the city.
